SELECT lm.lecture_member_id lectureMemberId, b.branch_name branchName, lc.lecture_category lectureCategory, mp.memberName memberName, lm.last_update lastUpdate, l.start_date startDate, l.end_date endDate FROM lecture_member lm LEFT JOIN lecture l ON lm.lecture_id = l.lecture_id LEFT JOIN lecture_category lc ON l.lecture_category_id = lc.lecture_category_id LEFT JOIN branch b ON l.permission_id = b.permission_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT m.member_name memberName, tr.permission_id permissionId FROM trainer_recruitment tr LEFT JOIN trainer_application ta ON tr.trainer_application_id = ta.trainer_application_id LEFT JOIN resume r ON ta.resume_id = r.resume_id LEFT JOIN member m ON r.member_id = m.member_id) mp ON mp.permissionId = b.permission_id WHERE lm.member_id = #{memberId}
